Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.log.checkpoint

Class StoreCopyCheckPointMutex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.log.checkpoint.StoreCopyCheckPointMutex
  • public class StoreCopyCheckPointMutex
extends Object
    Mutex between store-copy and check-point. This to prevent those two running concurrently.

    Normally a store-copy implies first doing a check-point and so this relationships is somewhat intricate. In addition to having storeCopy(ThrowingAction) as the "read lock" and checkPoint() as the "write lock", storeCopy(ThrowingAction) also accepts a code snippet to run before first concurrent store-copy grabs the lock, a snippet which can include a check-point. 

                                      <-WAIT--------------------|-CHECKPOINT--------->
                                  |                                              |
 |----------|-----|---------------|---|-----------|---------|-------------|------|--------------------------|-> TIME
            |     |                   |           |         |             |                                 |
            |     |                   <-----STORE-|-COPY---->             <-WAIT-|-CHECKPOINT-|-STORE-COPY-->
            |     |                               |
            |     <-WAIT--|-STORE-COPY------------>
            |                                   |
            <-CHECKPOINT--|-STORE-COPY---------->
    In the image above there are three "events":
    1. Store-copy 1, where there are three concurrent store-copies going on. Only the first one performs check-point
    2. External check-point, which waits for the ongoing store-copies to complete and then performs it
    3. Store-copy 2, which waits for the external check-point to complete and then starts its own check-point, which is part of the store-copy algorithm to then perform the store-copy.
    Status changes are made in synchronized as opposed to atomic CAS operations, since this results in simpler code and since this mutex is normally called a couple of times per hour it's not an issue.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private ReadWriteLock lock
      Main lock.
      private boolean storeCopyActionCompleted
      Whether or not the first (of the concurrently ongoing store-copy requests) has had its "before" action completed.
      private Throwable storeCopyActionError
      Error which may have happened during first concurrent store-copy request.
      private int storeCopyCount
      Number of currently ongoing store-copy requests.

    • Field Detail

      • lock

        private final ReadWriteLock lock
        Main lock. Read-lock is for storeCopy(ThrowingAction) and write-lock is for checkPoint().

      • storeCopyCount

        private int storeCopyCount
        Number of currently ongoing store-copy requests.

      • storeCopyActionCompleted

        private volatile boolean storeCopyActionCompleted
        Whether or not the first (of the concurrently ongoing store-copy requests) has had its "before" action completed. The other store-copy requests will wait for this flag to be true.

      • storeCopyActionError

        private volatile Throwable storeCopyActionError
        Error which may have happened during first concurrent store-copy request. Made available to the other concurrent store-copy requests so that they can fail instead of waiting forever.
